spell_tooltip.description:
Pillar of Frost grants you Remorseless Winter and increases its damage by 400% and its radius by 150%, but your movement speed is heavily reduced for its duration.

Pillar of Frost's cooldown is increased by 15 sec.

Your Remorseless Winter and Chains of Ice apply Deathchill, rooting the target in place for 4 sec.

Remorseless Winter 
All targets within 8 yards are afflicted with Deathchill when Remorseless Winter is cast.

Chains of Ice
When you Chains of Ice a target already afflicted by your Chains of Ice they will be afflicted by Deathchill.
Chains of Ice reduces the target's Haste by 8%. Frost Strike refreshes the duration of Chains of Ice.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 69,758 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 15.5 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.

Strike an enemy for 75,599 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 354,776 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 3%. When suffering a loss of control effect, this bonus is increased by an additional 6% for 6 sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Anti-Magic Shell increases healing received by 15%.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Damage taken below 30% Health is reduced by 35%.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 363,730 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Casting Anti-Magic Shell grants 2 nearby allies a Lesser Anti-Magic Shell that Absorbs up to 406,878 magic damage and reduces the duration of harmful Magic effects against them by 50%.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 313,888 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 208,873 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 38,274 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 506,340 Frost damage over 24 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate deal Frost damage and critically strike.
Remorseless Winter deals 6% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to 10 times.
Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by 2% for 10 sec, stacks up to 3 times.
Increases Frost Strike damage by 20%.
Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional 75%.
Increases Obliterate damage by 10%.
The power of frost increases your Strength by 30% for 12 sec.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by 35%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.
Obliterate deals 15% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by 15% for 6 sec. This effect lasts 2 sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Reduces Pillar of Frost cooldown by 15 sec.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within 40 yards in front of you for 71,327 Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you 8% Mastery for 15 sec, up to 40%.
Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within 40 yd in front of you, dealing 637,049 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 50% for 10 sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 38,720 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike, Soul Reaper, and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 178,437 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
When Frost Strike consumes 5 Razorice stacks, it deals 60% of the damage dealt to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Spending Runes has a chance to call forth the aid of a Horsemen for 10 sec.

Mograine
Casts Death and Decay at his location that follows his position.

Whitemane
Casts Undeath on your target dealing 18,955 Shadowfrost damage per stack every 3 sec, for 24 sec. Each time Undeath deals damage it gains a stack. Cannot be Refreshed.

Trollbane
Casts Chains of Ice on your target slowing their movement speed by 40% and increasing the damage they take from you by 5% for 8 sec.

Nazgrim
While Nazgrim is active you gain Apocalyptic Conquest, increasing your Strength by 5%.

Call upon your Death Charger to break free of movement impairment effects.

For 10 sec, while upon your Death Charger your movement speed is increased by 100%, you cannot be slowed below 100% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.
Your damage is increased by 5% and you gain the benefits of your Death and Decay while inside Mograine's Death and Decay.
When you take damage, 5% of the damage is redirected to each active horsemen.
When Obliterate damages an enemy affected by Undeath it gains 1 stack and infects another nearby enemy.

If an enemy dies while Nazgrim is active, the strength of Apocalyptic Conquest is increased by 3%.

Additionally, each Rune you spend increase its value by 1%.
Obliterate shatters Trollbane's Chains of Ice when hit, dealing 241,892 Shadowfrost damage to nearby enemies, and slowing them by 40% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
The damage of your diseases and Frost Strike are increased by 10%.
While you have 2 or more Horsemen aiding you, your Runic Power spending abilities deal 20% increased damage.
Obliterate deals 10% increased damage and the cooldown of your Death and Decay is reduced by 10 sec.
Army of the Dead and Frostwyrm's Fury call upon all 4 Horsemen to aid you for 20 sec.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of 68,988 Physical damage and heals you for 40.00% of all damage taken in the last 5 sec, minimum 11.2% of maximum health.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side.  You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.
Auto attacks have a chance to generate 3 Runic Power.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by 10, and its healing is increased by 60%.

Obliterate hits up to 2 additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay. 

When leaving your Death and Decay you retain its bonus effects for 4 sec.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for 5 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by 50% for 6 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Death's Advance grants an additional 25% movement speed over the first 3 sec.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants 10 Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by 3 sec.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by 20%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for 8 sec or until it absorbs 15.5 million damage.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Absorbs are 15% more effective on you.
The amount absorbed by Anti-Magic Zone is increased by 10% and its cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 314,132 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 212,697 Physical damage.

Blast the target with a frigid wind, dealing 37,679 Frost damage to that foe, and reduced damage to all other enemies within 10 yards, infecting all targets with Frost Fever.

 Frost Fever
A disease that deals 506,340 Frost damage over 24 sec and has a chance to grant the Death Knight 5 Runic Power each time it deals damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by 20 sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by 40%.
Gain 5% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by 30% and the damage they deal to you by 12% for 6 sec.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to 30% of the damage dealt.
Stamina increased by 12%.
Create a death pact that heals you for 50% of your maximum health, but absorbs incoming healing equal to 30% of your max health for 15 sec.
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal 6% increased damage for 5 sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by 6% for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by 20%.
Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for 5 sec.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by 70% for 4 sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.

While active, your movement speed cannot be reduced below 170%.

Strike an enemy for 77,251 Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After 5 sec, if the target is below 35% health this effect will explode dealing an additional 354,776 Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Increases Leech by 3%.
Increases Lichborne duration by 2 sec and while active damage taken is reduced by 15%.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by 5% for 30 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Your chance to be critically struck is reduced by 3% and your Armor is increased by 6%.

When you fall below 30% health you drain 119,478 health from nearby enemies, the damage you take is reduced by 10% and your Death Strike cost is reduced by 10 for 8 sec.

Can only occur every 2 min.
Consuming a Rune has a chance to increase your Strength by 6% for 8 sec.
When you pull an enemy, the damage they deal to you is reduced by 6% for 6 sec.
Magic damage taken is reduced by 5% and the duration of harmful Magic effects against you are reduced by 35%.

Sprout an additional limb, dealing 369,077 Shadow damage over 12 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Every 1 sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than 8 yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every 4 sec.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have 1 additional charge.
Chill your weapons with icy power and quickly strike the enemy with both, dealing a total of 309,611 Frost damage.
A brutal attack with both weapons that deals a total of 215,127 Physical damage.

Empower your rune weapon, gaining 15% Haste and generating 1 Rune and 5 Runic Power instantly and every 5 sec for 20 sec.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a 25% chance to grant you 1 Rune.

Gain Inexorable Assault every 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Obliterate consumes a stack to deal an additional 45,405 Frost damage.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by 10%, and extends its duration by 0.5 sec.
Each time Frost Fever deals damage, 15% of the damage dealt is gathered into the next cast of Remorseless Winter, up to 20 times.

Consuming Killing Machine grants 1% critical strike chance for 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times. At 5 stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you 20% increased Frost damage for 10 sec.

Your auto attack damage is increased by 10%. 

This amount is increased for each stack of Icy Talons you have and it can stack up to 2 additional times.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing 39,207 Frost damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike, Soul Reaper, and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a 30% chance to generate a Rune.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to send out a torrent of ice dealing 178,437 Frost damage to enemies in front of you.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with 5 stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional 115% damage.
Consuming Killing Machine fires a Glacial Advance through your target at 80% effectiveness.
While Pillar of Frost is active your auto-attack critical strikes increase its duration by 2 sec, up to a maximum of 6 sec.
